answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some articles and sample succession plans that may be helpful.
The article, “Succeeding at Succession,” describes the best policies for succession planning.
http://icma.org/en/Article/10832/Succeeding_at_Succession
I also found an article detailing the succession plans proposed in Henrico County, VA and two other cities.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302033/Succession_Planning 
This is a case study from Yuma, AZ discussing that strategic management plan.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/21046/When_the_Whining_and_the_Wish_List_No_longer_Work_Try_A_Real_Strategic_Management_Plan 
Another article, “Succession Planning: The Time Has Arrived,” from the Texas Municipal League details the programs uses in some towns. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/1631/Succession_Planning_The_Time_Has_Arrived 
A similar article addresses the best practices and problems that may arise when implementing a succession plan.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2081/The_Myths_and_Realities_of_Succession_Planning 
I have also included a couple of  sample succession plans from the following places:
San Mateo County, CA
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/21039/Workforce_and_Succession_Management_Program 
County of Sedgwick, KS
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302281/2010_ICMA_Strategic_Leadership_and_Governance_Award_Nominee_Succession_Planning 
Village of Schaumburg, IL 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302282/2010_ICMA_Strategic_Leadership_and_Governance_Award_Recipient_Talent_Management 
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Chinn Park MAGIC
text:
The Prince William County (VA)Police Department is seeking any information and any examples about the following:
Succession plans
Career path flow charts
Entry level through executive level leadership development plans.
Please respond to Captain Alfred E. Miller, Criminal Justice Academy Director, PWC Police Dept.
amiller@pwcgov.org or magic2@pwcgov.org
Thanks!
title: Succession plans, leadership development
